thread.title: Great location great place to stat - Review
thread.title_full: Great location great place to stat - Review of EVEN Hotel Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Antietam788
title: Great location great place to stat - Review
text:
We liked this hotel! Walking distance from Penn station, very clean room, pleasant staff. There was infused water in the lobby and a take-with-you water bottle
In the room. Yoga mats and exercise gear in our room too! We will stay here again.
